title: 03/04/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 03/04/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin assumes the roll as Dak Prescott's agent and gives him advice on how to approach his current contract situation with the Cowboys. He plays the "Blind Resume" Game with one NFL head coach but presents a silver lining for a certain NFL team looking to take the next step. He also reacts to the latest news with the Seahawks now taking offers for quarterback Russell Wilson and Ben Roethlisberger signing a new contract with the Steelers for 2021. Plus, former WR T. J. Houshmandzadeh joins the show to share some insight on the top prospects of the NFL draft.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
